TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

Docs.summary: Provides data for the events in the control that change the position of the annotation.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs> class is used for the two annotation-positioning events, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>, in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs.Annotation%2A> property gets the annotation object that is being positioned. This class also contains properties that retrieve the new location, width, height and anchor location of the annotation that is repositioned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs.Annotation%2A> property allows the developer to set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation> properties during the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the new annotation anchor point X location.
Docs.value: A value that represents the new annotation anchor point X location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> events are raised, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs.NewAnchorLocationX%2A> property determines the new X coordinate of the annotation. This information is useful when the annotation is newly anchored to a data point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events are raised, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs.NewSizeHeight%2A> property to determine the new height of the annotation. This information can be used when you resize the annotation.
